comments.author: tippytoes
comments.body: Your website link is not working and need to be rectified to - https://fungy.io/#/What I worry about NFT collectibles is their worth afterwards. This is the dilemma of some buyers, if their item will still have a value in the future. So do you think the fungy nft marketplace are selling worthwhile NFT items, that can be of value in the future?
